name: A Paradox in Time
description:
This is a round based Dungeon Crawler with restricted time. The twist is, that you can cast a spell, which opens a time portal.

This portal becomes important when the time is up. Then you can travel back to the place and time where this portal was summoned.

Additional you get time splinter from enemies if you defeat them. You can use time splinter to get bonus rounds.

This game was developed in 72 hours during the Big Brain Jam 4.0.
